commenter_b: I'd add not to be shy about calling your OB for more pain meds, especially after multiple c-sections. They're not surprised, it's actually common. I wish I would have called sooner than suffer unnecessarily.
commenter_a: I've had 6 c-sections.. 3 of which were After a long labor. While laughing and/or coughing is painful for the 1st day, that's about the worst of it, I never took pain meds after... The first one I might call 'rough'- but the other 5 were not bad at all. #5 was 6 weeks early and I had to pump milk and walk to the nursery (she needed the heat light) every 2 hours to feed her, it really wasn't that bad.
post_message: Congratulations! Your ab muscles are completely non-existent now. The good news: Your arms are gonna get buff.
